core:version.help: The version of the SigMF specification used to create the collection file.

core:description.help: A text description of the SigMF collection.

core:author.help: The author's name (and optionally e-mail address) of the form "Bruce Wayne wayne@example.com".

core:collection_doi.help: The registered DOI (ISO 26324) for a collection.

core:license.help: A URL for the license document under which the collection is offered; when possible, use the canonical document provided by the license author, or, failing that, a well-known one.

core:hagl.help: Recording Tuple pointing to a F32 type dataset representing aperture HAGL.

core:extensions.help: A list of extensions used by this collection.

optional.help: Whether or not this extension is required to parse this collection.

core:streams.help: The base filename of a `collection` with which this Recording is associated.
